p: IIntelletec has partnered with an SF-based startup, building the next-generation data toolchain for ML developers. Founded by engineers from Google and Uber they are growing fast!
p.2: They are seeking an early engineer to work alongside leading industry and academic experts; you will play a foundational role in designing, building, and scaling both products and the team.
p.4: If you are interested in solving complex problems at the intersection of Data and ML this is a great role for you!

li: A startup mindset, biasing towards thoughtful action with minimal direction.
li.1: 2+ years of experience building data/ML products
li.2: Experience working with NoSQL and SQL databases.
li.3: Experience building APIs in Python, Go, and/ or TypeScript (JavaScript is fine too).
li.4: No worries when shipping code to production =E2=80=93 because you wrote lots of tests for it.
li.5: Experience with writing and maintaining customer-facing API documentation as well as internal documentation.
li.6: Extensive experience with git and GitHub =E2=80=93 it=E2=80=99s almost second nature for you.
li.7: Bonus: Experience working with Docker and Kubernetes.
li.8: Bonus: Experience building applications on AWS, Google Cloud, and Microsoft Azure.
li.9: Bonus: Experience building customer-facing products with ML frameworks (like PyTorch, Tensorflow, Keras, etc)
li.10: Bonus: Experience building customer-facing products with data processing tools (like Apache Spark, Apache Storm, BigQuery, etc)

li.1: Best in class medical, vision, and dental insurance
li.2: Annual wellness allowance for your mental or physical wellness needs
